plugin.name: Awesome SEO
plugin.homepage.title: Plugin HomePage
plugin.homepage.subtitle: CMS analyzer by ExFabrica
plugin.seo.runningAnalysisProgress: {current}/{total} pages analyzed. The analysis may take a few minutes, please wait...
plugin.seo.title: Awesome SEO
plugin.seo.subtitle: SEO from your Website to your Strapi!
plugin.editor.globalError.title: Awesome SEO - Errors
plugin.settings.title: Awesome SEO general settings
plugin.settings.seo.title: General settings
plugin.settings.seo.enabled: Enable display of SEO errors in content pages?
plugin.settings.seo.enabled.descr: Enable or disable the display of SEO errors in each content page
plugin.settings.seo.frontEnd: Your website URL which eats Strapi content
plugin.settings.seo.frontEnd.descr: The URL of the frontend you want to analyze
plugin.settings.seo.expert.descr: Expert mode allows you to see a sum-up of errors on global result page. It also allows you to see errors which must be fixed by your website development teams
plugin.settings.advanced.title: Advanced settings
plugin.settings.advanced.clickToFind.des: Allow the script to find hidden links by clicking on elements on the page. Enable this option to find missing pages, but slow down the process.
plugin.settings.advanced.clickToFind.war: Enable this parameter will slow down the analysis.
plugin.settings.advanced.navigationTimeo: In seconds (min: 2, max: 10), the time allocated for trying to detect pages that are not referenced by normal links. It is the time of one click on each element of a page. You can update this parameter if you think more time is needed to access to your pages.
plugin.settings.button.save.label: Save
plugin.seo.summary.information.title: Information
plugin.seo.summary.result.title: Result
plugin.seo.summary.recommendation.title: Recommendation
plugin.seo.summary.recommendation.descr: After fixing the errors, you shoud run the scan again to check that errors are correctly fixed.
plugin.settings.seo.description.title: Awesome SEO is still a work in progress.
plugin.settings.seo.description.content: Front scanning can be time-consuming for your production server.
plugin.settings.seo.description.click.co: 'Find hidden links' is a very cool feature but remains an intensive and time-consuming operation. Use with caution on your production server.
